content: this is my dog amigurumi pattern that can be used to make a cute jack russel or a little puppy of a different breed on my website there is also an accompanying video tutorial in case you need visual guidance **techniques used ** magic_ring invisible decreases in single_crochet color changes in single_crochet closing small rounds and invisible finishes with this pattern you also learn how to use the tapestry technique when crocheting amigurumi **construction ** the dog is crocheted from bottom to top the legs are crocheted on the ears head and tail are sewn on the nose is embroidered if using the recommended yarn weight and hook size your amigurumi dog will be about 3 / 7 6cm tall and 2 / 5cm long **required materials and tools ** * cotton yarn in a dk / light worsted weight in 2 different colors * 2 5mm crochet hook / size b-1 or c-2 depending on how tightly you crochet * 5mm safety eyes or black embroidery floss * black embroidery floss * fiberfill * stitch markers * yarn needle * large eyed sewing needle * pins * scissors **language ** english us i m always happy to help don t hesitate to message me here on ravelry or email me at stellasyarnuniverse at outlook com if you need help with the download or the pattern thank you for stopping by happy creating
